attributes.action: Stop getting rid of the british naval bases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should not get rid of any naval base as Plymouth and Portsmouth have played a major part in the British fleet. Also if Faslane was not open there would be more people to accommodate for in Plymouth and Portsmouth and the population in Scotland would decrease.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
